values: 喝；喝酒；（尤指）酗酒；饮；饮用；吸收；吸取（液体）；沉醉；陶醉；痴迷
酒；饮料；酒精饮料；一口（饮料）；酒会

word_group.brief_definition: 无酒精饮料, 软性饮料
酒精性饮料；酒精饮料；酒精饮品
醉酒驾驶, 醉驾, 酒驾
(习惯性)饮酒过度, 酗酒, 豪饮
把某人喝得钻到桌子底下去；酒量大得足以把某人灌醉

bilingual.target: 我不喝葡萄酒，只喝烈酒。

bilingual.source: Drink juice, water, tea and milk, not cola.
bilingual.target: 喝果汁、水、茶和牛奶，不要喝可乐。

bilingual.source: Drink a glass of milk every day.

list.abstract: drink（英[drɪŋk]，美[drɪŋk]），英语单词。作动词时，释义为喝；饮；吸收。作名词时，释义为饮料；酒；喝酒。短语搭配为have a drink（喝一杯）。例句为“The soft drink gained in popularity.（这种软饮料越来越受欢迎。）” drink的复数为drinks，现在分词为drinking，过去分词为drunk。其及物动词近义词有eat、absorb，不及物动词近义词有wine、liquor，名词性近义词有beverage。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, and I need a drink.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，而我需要喝一杯。

yingyinNormal.en: That's sweet. Drink your hair.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想的美。喝你的头发吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on honey, let's go drink our body weight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们去喝个痛快。

yingyinNormal.en: I think you should drink the fat. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想你应该把那杯油喝掉。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll walk myself out. You enjoy your drink.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我自己出去，你继续喝吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh that's actually how the French drink it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法国人都是那样喝香槟的。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry. David, would you like a drink?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不好意思，大卫，你要喝点什么吗?

yingyinNormal.en: How about fix you a drink? Maybe a margarita?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我帮你弄杯喝的玛格莉特好吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You drink more than you used to. Yes. Why?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你以前不喝这么多酒。是的。为什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Don't drink coke, it's killing you and your family.
yingyinNormal.zh: 停止喝可乐，它正在杀死你与你的家人。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《可口可乐史上最诚实的广告》

yingyinNormal.en: What else would I drink, gases, solids, ionized plasma?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还能喝什么？气体，固体，还是电离等离子体？

yingyinNormal.en: All right, get some rest and drink plenty of fluids.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，多休息，多喝点液体。

yingyinNormal.en: May I offer you something to drink? You know I don't drink. Not even strawberry Quik?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我给你倒点饮料喝吧？你知道我不喝饮料。这个也不喝吗？草莓速溶奶？

yingyinNormal.en: I feel like I need a drink. Do you want to go somewhere, have a drink with me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得我需要去喝一杯。你想去什么地方？和我喝一杯吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Can I have this special pink drink now? Yes, but don't drink, Peppa, spit it out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我现在可以喝漱口水了吗？可以，但不能喝下去，要吐出来。

yingyinNormal.en: George. If you drink too quickly, you will get hiccups again. I'm not as little as George. I can drink juice as quickly as I want to.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治，你喝得那么快，等一会又要打嗝了。不过我可比乔治大多了，所以我可以想喝多快就喝多快。

yingyinNormal.en: You won't fool a fly or me. I'm not gonna drink it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你休想愚弄我，我是不会喝的。

yingyinNormal.en: Stalling me won't change anything. No, no. Threatening. No drink? Are you sure? I'm having one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拖延我救不了你。不不，是威胁，你真不喝吗？那我自己喝。

yingyinNormal.en: How is you drinking helping the kids? Because the more I drink, the less there is for the kids to drink.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你喝酒怎么能帮助儿童？我喝得越多，孩子们喝酒就越少。

yingyinNormal.en: It's thirsty work, this traveling around. Would you like a drink? Yes, please. Lemonade. My favourite. That's lovely.
yingyinNormal.zh: 四处旅行真的非常口渴，想来点喝的吗？好的，谢谢你。是柠檬汽水！我最爱喝得饮料。恩，真是太好喝了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 醉的；喝醉的；陶醉于…中的；因…而兴奋不已的

word_family.mean: v. 喝；饮；喝酒；酗酒；把…喝完；全神贯注地看；被强烈地吸引住；陶醉于；吸收；喝起来有某种滋味

examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他人和奶牛一起喝水。

examination_example.sentence: So long as they're enjoyable, and not likely to have negative side effects, such as <highlight>drinking</highlight> too much alcohol.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要它们是令人愉快的，而且不太可能有负面的副作用，比如喝太多的酒。

examination_example.sentence: My own hospital system has banned sugary <highlight>drinks</highlight> from its facilities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的医院系统已经禁止含糖饮料进入。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 酒精性饮料；酒精饮料；酒精饮品

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 醉的；喝醉的；陶醉于…中的；因…而兴奋不已的

word_family.mean: v. 喝；饮；喝酒；酗酒；把…喝完；全神贯注地看；被强烈地吸引住；陶醉于；吸收；喝起来有某种滋味

examination_example.sentence: As the soft <highlight>drink</highlight> gained in popularity, it faced a growing number of competitors—counterfeits even trying to copy Coke's logo.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着软饮料的普及，它面临着越来越多的竞争对手——假冒伪劣产品甚至试图复制可口可乐的标志。

examination_example.sentence: Rum, a strong alcoholic <highlight>drink</highlight>, which is distilled from sugar cane, is also an export.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 朗姆酒是一种烈性酒精饮料，由甘蔗蒸馏而成，也是一种出口产品。

examination_example.sentence: Lee was known not to <highlight>drink</highlight> alcohol at all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 众所周知李小龙根本不喝酒。

sense_info_list.en: alcohol, or the habitual or excessive consumption of alcohol

direction_info.description:

word_family.mean: v. 喝；饮；喝酒；酗酒；把…喝完；全神贯注地看；被强烈地吸引住；陶醉于；吸收；喝起来有某种滋味

examination_example.sentence: Americans <highlight>drink</highlight> 37% less milk than they did in the 1970s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国人喝的牛奶比20世纪70年代少了37%。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>drink</highlight> too many pints every day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们每天喝太多品脱(牛奶)。

examination_example.sentence: To ensure customers <highlight>drink</highlight> the right amount of soda.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以确保顾客喝到适量的汽水。

word_family.mean: v. 喝；饮；喝酒；酗酒；把…喝完；全神贯注地看；被强烈地吸引住；陶醉于；吸收；喝起来有某种滋味

examination_example.sentence: I'd love to have a <highlight>drink</highlight> there.
They must <highlight>drink</highlight> water all the time.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 醉的；喝醉的；陶醉于…中的；因…而兴奋不已的

word_family.mean: v. 喝；饮；喝酒；酗酒；把…喝完；全神贯注地看；被强烈地吸引住；陶醉于；吸收；喝起来有某种滋味

examination_example.sentence: These children were physically in better shape and <highlight>drank</highlight> fewer sugary soft drinks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些孩子身材体形更好，喝的含糖软饮料更少。

examination_example.sentence: Tea, the most popular <highlight>drink</highlight> in the world, was invented by accident.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 茶，作为世界上最受欢迎的饮料，是偶然被发明出来的。

examination_example.sentence: There was nowhere in which a waiter brought you food and <highlight>drink</highlight> that you picked from a menu.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有哪个地方会有服务员给你送来你在菜单上点的食物和饮料。

examination_example.sentence: Although the dishes were simple, we <highlight>drank</highlight> a lot and I felt the passion（热情）from the bottom of his heart.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管饭菜简单，但我们仍然喝了很多酒，我感受到了他内心底的热情。

examination_example.sentence: If they are not afraid of the harm of smoking and <highlight>drinking</highlight>, why should common people be afraid?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果他们不怕抽烟酗酒的危害，普通人又何必害怕呢？

examination_example.sentence: People watch their "heroes" on TV <highlight>drinking</highlight> alcohol (酒) or smoking cigarettes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们在电视上看到他们的“英雄”喝酒抽烟。
